general.question: What is ZetScore?
general.answer: ZetScore is an employee performance management platform that helps organizations track, assess, develop, and improve employee performance with data-driven insights.

general.question: How does the Onboarding feature work?
general.answer: Onboarding guides new hires through digital document signing, work authorization verification, background checks, profile setup, and a manager-defined first-day plan — all in one seamless flow.

freePlan.question: What is included in the Free Plan?
freePlan.answer: The Free Plan offers basic access to core features like Peer Review, Assessment, Personal Development and Worforce Analytics for 3 months trial period. The Free Plan does not offer (Onboarding, Background Checks and Work Authorization) which are part of our Advanced modules.

freePlan.question: Can I use Onboarding or Background Check in the Free Plan?
freePlan.answer: No, Onboarding is included in Business, while Background Check and Work Authorisation are Enterprise-only features.

paidPlan.question: What’s the main difference between Business and Enterprise plans?
paidPlan.answer: Business gives you core performance tools + Onboarding. Enterprise unlocks advanced analytics, NPS (eNPS and cNPS), Employee Wellbeing, Background Checks, Work Authorisation, unlimited storage, and 24/7 support.

paidPlan.question: How do I upgrade my plan?
paidPlan.answer: Log in to your dashboard, go to Billing/Settings, and select the desired plan. Upgrades are immediate; contact support if you need custom Enterprise pricing.

paidPlan.question: Are Background Check and Work Authorisation available in Business?
paidPlan.answer: No — these compliance-critical features are exclusive to the Enterprise plan to ensure proper verification processes and legal safeguards.
